column5: hey great time with the brother! always a good time thats one of the things my brother do best together.... that and beer/wings! ahhh the simple good times...
Sounds good to me.  Regardless.I have to take a trip to Ottawa next summer for sure!

Oh that's absolutely an awesome report Kev Loved the release shot that Jason took of your gator Sounds like you guys had a blast with them bronzebacks!!! Great job you guys and thanks for sharing Jacques
good thing i live closee to down town ottawa!  shoot me a pm when you come down.  BIG bass are waitting.
Very nice! Nothing like having a bro' to fish with!
You and your clone did very well!  Awesome spots you have around there.  Thanks,  Oh, and love the additional bird shots!
Awesome report man!    You guys have some great small mouth lakes out your way!    I'm hoping to target smallies once more this year as well...still looking for my first nickel!

Well i was blessed to spend this week end with my brother!  I planned the fishing trip to a small private pike and small mouth lake.  Untouched PARADICE!  We start the day @ 10 pm.  light winds sunny skies.  second or thrid cast of the day my brother hooks into his first small mouth of the day.    Then its my turn i hit a rocky point that drop form 5 Fow to 15-20 FOW.  i cast a 1 1/2 onze spinnerbait and tip PIG of a bronzeback want into the action!    Jason (brother) cast's back into his hole and he hits another nice FOOTBALL  ONE SMALLIE TWO SMALLIES??!?!?!    The bass were feeding for winter hitting heavy lures.  BIG spinnerbaits the type you use for 10 + pike.    almost dosent fit in there mouth but they manedge two swallow the darn thing!  Small mouth were slowing down and im wondering why!  NO WONDER!  we get to a tall salad bar and there he was roaming the erea.       my brother got this amazing action shot of the pike WIPPING its tail to escape my perfect release shot!    The bite was on and off all day.  my brother missed a bass on a white big-o that would traumatize some anglers.  i know i am .  i think i wont sleep tonight after seeing that PIG! must have been a 20 " plus easy.  at around 3 pm the bass were slowing down to a point were you had to work you    to get only one.    They were all worth it dont get me wrong.  but we decided to leave.   5 houres of fishing.   20 + smallmouth   3 pikes including one for super.  EXELENT day on the water.

Oh man!!! I see the family resemblance!!!... you Bubba could be a "Mini Me"!!!... and if those fish were any heavier, y'all would fall flat on your faces from holding them out so far!!!  ... but they are all beauty fish and there's nothing better than spending quality time with family!!!  Excellent report, pics, and fish Kevin!!!  Thanks for taking the time to post!!!
MOUAHAHA i trained him just like a pro.  MAXIMUN EXTENSION!
That was the same exact thing Miss Stephanie was asking me if I needed the last time we chatted... I told her no!

What a fantastic report!! I mean it, wow. It is reports like this that make me wish that my brother wasn't such a tool (actually he is a good guy that would probably like me to call him up and take him fishing. Hey, wait a tick, maybe it's me that is the tool. Man, I hate this report) Jim PS. WHAT A PIKE!!!!
awesome report man, great looking fish
Well ...  The only thing active in my life today was a Bluejay with a Bad Hair day....            It was a nice day to be out .........
Sounds like a great day.   Awesome to see they were hitting spinner baits that big.   For sure on the winter feed.  Great learning there.  Thanks
Your Blue Jays look wimpier than mine.. and less well groomed as welll!!!... maybe they should take lessons from my Mockingbirds?
Seems like a late start don't you think  Great job out there guys, always love spending time with my little brother out on the water. Thanks for sharing, MTBF

Quality time with your Bro...well done!!!  My bro is a busy man so we don't wet a line together very much...but both of us look forward to it when we get the chance.  Great report and pic's....thx for sharin.
HAHAH thank for taking the time to look at the FINE details of my report mike!  ill leave it AS IS for the fun of it!
Great report with some nice fish pictures. You guys sure have some great fishing out your way. Did you weigh the second last bass? it looks like a fat one.
Nice fish.  Great extention. good work.  I haven't been out in over 2 weeks and I am so anxious.  I won't get out until the 13th of Nov.  Hope they are still eating.

in two weeks from now cuds is going to be the best time man.  that when they have the over sized belly.  where a 4 lbs small mouth weights in at 5 +!  these small mouth were still very active.  smashing my lures at the second or third roll of the reel.  and the pike!  took my arm right of.  had to sow it back to continue the day!
sadly my cousin borrowed my scale.  but that bass is in the 4 lbs range.  no fish over 5 were caught that day.  i saw so many 4 + come out of that lake it dosent make SENSE!
great report those are some really nice fish you got there
ma you do awesome reports.  cheers
Those are super healthy looking smallmouth WTG.  Clarence
WOW! Are there any apartments for rent in  the area? That lake looks amazing! Those are some nice smallies and a solid pike to boot. Thanks for sharing.
well johnny  as soon as i buy a piece of land and build a cottage you can stay in the guest room !  only thing you have to to is bring me to one of oyur musky hot spots!
great pics.....  looks like you and brother had fun
Ya got 'em dialed in kid.  Nice as always.
Have you met Baldy yet ???
Nice hawgs!
